SA01vabhdilu:3_1: taṃ satpathajñaṃ praṇipatya buddhaṃ śāstraṃ kariṣyāmyabhidharmadīpam // [1] //
SA01vabhdilu:5_2: nabhaḥ khalu nabho dhātorāsanno hetureṣa tu /
SA01vabhdilu:6_0: abhidharmadīpe vimāṣāprabhāyāṃ vṛttau prathamā(mā) dhyāsya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //
SA01vabhdilu:8_19: na śubhaṃ nāpi ca kliṣṭaṃ dvitīyādiṣu darśakam // [26] //
SA01vabhdilu:8_38: spṛśyaṃ dvidhā sadharmāṃśāḥ saha tā nava bhautikāḥ /
SA01vabhdilu:8_39: daśa sāvayavā mūrtāḥ ta eva daśa saṃcitāḥ // [36] //
SA01vabhdilu:9_0: abhidharmadīpe vibhāṣāprabhāyāṃ vṛttau prathamasyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ //
SA01vabhdilu:11_8: na hyū rdhvaṃ cakṣuṣaḥ kāyo na rūpaṃ nākṣijaṃ manaḥ /
SA01vabhdilu:11_9: vijñānasya tu netrārthastau ca kāyasya savaṃtaḥ // [48] //
SA01vabhdilu:11_10: nopariṣṭācchru teḥ kāyo na śabdo na svakaṃ manaḥ /
SA01vabhdilu:11_11: vijñānasya tu nihrādastau ca kāyasya sarvataḥ // [49] //
SA01vabhdilu:11_39: tadā saṃyojanaṃ tvāryaḥ paryādatte na kiñcanā // [63] //
SA01vabhdilu:11_42: na tu saṃyojanaṃ kiñcitparyādatte tadā hyasau /
SA01vabhdilu:11_51: ābhāsvarācca vairāgyaṃ yāti hanti tu nāsravān // [69] //
SA01vabhdilu:11_53: śubhakṛtsnācca vairāgyaṃ yāti kleśānna hanti tu // [70] //
SA01vabhdilu:11_54: dvivijñeyāḥ guṇāḥ pañca hetuḥ sarve kṣarākṣarāḥ /
SA01vabhdilu:15_2: nāmnā dvāviṃśatistāni dravyato daśa sapta ca /
SA01vabhdilu:15_20: śraddhādīnāṃ vidāṃ caiva doṣaḥ śuddhau malodaye /
SA01vabhdilu:15_28: kāyasya bādhanaṃ duḥkhaṃ daurmanasyaṃ tu cetasaḥ /
SA01vabhdilu:15_29: sukhaṃ ca sumanastā ca sātaṃ śārīramānasam // [86] //
SA01vabhdilu:15_36: anyaiḥ ṣaṭ sapta vāṣṭau vā ṣaḍ rūpe antye tu jīvitam // [90] //
SA01vabhdilu:15_38: daśāṣṭau nava catvāri kāme pañca śubhāni vā // [91] //
SA01vabhdilu:16_0: abhidharmadīpe vibhāṣāprabhāyāṃ vṛttau dvitīyasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //
SA01vabhdilu:18_21: samyaktvaniyatā ye tu ye ca śraddhādhimuktikāḥ /
SA01vabhdilu:18_38: cittaṃ caitasikaiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ tu svalakṣaṇaiḥ // [111] //
SA01vabhdilu:19_0: abhidharmadīpe vibhāṣāprabhāyāṃ vṛttau dvitīyasya [adhyāyasya] dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //
SA01vabhdilu:21_5: kliṣṭe ṣaṭ aśubhe tu dve āhrīkyamanapatrapā // [114] //
SA01vabhdilu:21_37: ādilābhe saha prākca tadūrdhvaṃ vā tridheṣyate // [131] //
SA01vabhdilu:21_38: kliṣṭāṇāṃ kuśalānāṃ ca tadanyeṣāṃ tridhā matā /
SA01vabhdilu:21_62: svarūpaṃ vedayaṃścchabdo vyañjanā dīni ca dhruvam /
SA01vabhdilu:21_68: na śrutyā śrūyate śabdastadanyā ca gatiḥ śruteḥ /
SA01vabhdilu:27_0: abhidharmadīpe [vibhāṣāprabhāyāṃ vṛttau tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya ca]turthaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ //
SA01vabhdilu:31_2: kāyikaṃ vāṅmayaṃ caiva cetanākhyaṃ ca mānasam /
SA01vabhdilu:34_9: etānyo yāti śaraṇaṃ sa yāti śaraṇatrayam // [163] //
SA01vabhdilu:34_23: bhūsaṃcāreṇa hānyā ca tyajyate dhyānajaṃ śubham // [170] //
SA01vabhdilu:34_36: adho 'pi madhyamaṃ karma dhyānenā ntyepi nirvṛteḥ /
SA01vabhdilu:34_45: satkṣetre kriyate yacca phalaṃ tasya niyamyate // [181] //
SA01vabhdilu:34_56: navame cetanā yā tu sā kṛṣṇākṛṣṇayā [ghā]tinī /
SA01vabhdilu:37_1: śubhāḥ sapta dvidhā jñeyā ekavai(dhai)te samāhitāḥ // [190] //
SA01vabhdilu:37_9: prāṇinaścātha bhogāśca nāmarūpaṃ ca nāma ca // [194] //
SA01vabhdilu:37_35: phalaṃ śubhasya catvāri dvetrīṇi ca śubhādayaḥ // [207] //
SA01vabhdilu:37_36: śubhādyāstvaśubhasya dve trīṇi catvāri ca kramāt /
SA01vabhdilu:37_37: avyākṛtasya te tu dve trīṇi trīṇi śubhādayaḥ // [208] //
SA01vabhdilu:37_42: ekaṃ trīṇi dvayaṃ caiva śaikṣādyāḥ paścimasya tu /
SA01vabhdilu:37_43: dve dve pañca yathāsaṃkhyaṃ dṛggheyasya tu karmaṇaḥ // [211] //
SA01vabhdilu:37_44: trīṇi catvāri caikaṃ ca dṛṣṭiheyādayaḥ smṛtāḥ /
SA01vabhdilu:37_45: te tvabhyāsapraheyasya dve catvāri tridhā matāḥ // [212] //
SA01vabhdilu:37_51: karttṛtā bhoktṛtā coktā niṣiddhā śāśvatasya tu // [215] //
SA01vabhdilu:38_0: abhidharmadīpe vibhāṣāprabhāyāṃ vṛttau caturthasyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ //
SA01vabhdilu:40_9: dviṣatāmapi yaṃ dṛṣṭvā manaḥ sadyaḥ prasīdati // [227] //
SA01vabhdilu:40_13: buddhotpāde naraḥ strī vā tadādyaṃ cittamaśnute // [229] //
SA01vabhdilu:44_18: bhavāgre kṣāntiheyā ye dṛggheyā eva te matāḥ /
SA01vabhdilu:44_20: ahaṃ mameti yā dṛṣṭirasau satkāyadṛk smṛtā /
SA01vabhdilu:44_40: dravyato daśa caikaśca nāmnā sapta tu te matāḥ /
SA01vabhdilu:45_0: abhidharmadīpe vibhāṣāprabhāyāṃ vṛttau pañcamasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //
SA01vabhdilu:47_5: avidyā dhīśca tṛṣṇā ca na kāṅkṣāmānadṛṣṭayaḥ // [291] //
SA01vabhdilu:47_22: ebhyo yaḥ prathamo vādī bhajate sādhutāmalau /
SA01vabhdilu:47_49: vada somya kathaṃ yāti pratītyā vastu vastutām // [313] //
SA01vabhdilu:47_62: ko vighnaḥ aṅgavaikalyam na tatsarvāstitā sadā /
SA01vabhdilu:47_63: tatkathaṃ śrūyatāṃ sadbhyaḥ durbodhā khalu dharmatā // [320] //
SA01vabhdilu:47_69: tathā śaktistathā velā tathā sattā tathā kriyā // [323] //
SA01vabhdilu:47_75: dharmāḥ pañcadhā nirmalāścaiva vijñānāni tathaiva ca // [326] //
SA01vabhdilu:47_88: catvāraḥ parivṛtte sve rūpāptāḥ khalvapi trayaḥ /
SA01vabhdilu:47_95: rūpāpte prathame 'dhastāt trayaḥ sve khalvapi trayaḥ // [336] //
SA01vabhdilu:47_116: duḥkhendriye tu kāmāptaḥ svaireva saha sarvagaiḥ /
SA01vabhdilu:47_129: bhavatyanantaraṃ ṣaḍ vā tasyodardhvaṃ pañca pañca vā // [353] //
SA01vabhdilu:47_131: ekaṃ vā pañca vā ṣaḍ vā sapta vā yadi vā daśa // [354] //
SA01vabhdilu:48_0: abhidharmadīpe vibhāṣāprabhāyāṃ vṛttau pañcamasyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //
SA01vabhdilu:50_0: vyavidyāḥ sakalāḥ kleśāḥ kāme kāmāsravo mataḥ /
SA01vabhdilu:50_4: sāvidyā dve upādāne yathākto(ktau) dve tu dṛṅmaye /
SA01vabhdilu:50_12: ādyantye dve dṛśau kāṃkṣā(kāṅkṣā)kāmacchando dvireva yaḥ /
SA01vabhdilu:50_43: dvābhyāṃ māyā tathā śāṭhyaṃ mrakṣo middhaṃ tathaiva ca // [381] //
